args.name: Argument

00: Off
01: Gamma 1
02: Gamma 2
03: Gamma 3
04: Gamma 4
05: Gamma 5

07: Gamma 7
08: Gamma 8

args.name: Argument
args.description:
00: Full
01: Normal
02: Wide Zoom
03: Zoom
07: Full
08: Full2

response.description:
0x0000: No Error
0x0001: Lamp Error
0x0002: Fan Error
0x0004: Cover Error
0x0008: Temp Error
0x0010: D5V Error
0x0020: Power Error
0x0040: Temp Warning
0x0080: NVM Data Error

0x0000: Standby
0x0001: Start Up
0x0002: Startup Lamp
0x0003: Power On
0x0004: Cooling1
0x0005: Cooling2
0x0006: Saving Cooling1
0x0007: Saving Cooling2
0x0008: Saving Standby

commands.name: Power On
commands.description: Must be sent twice when the unit is in standby mode
